entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening.
